titles: Gospel order revived being an answer to a book lately set forth by ... Increase Mather ... entituled, The order of the gospel, &c ... / by sundry ministers of the gospel in New England.
author: Colman, Benjamin, 1673-1747.
Pemberton, Ebenezer, 1672-1717.
Woodbridge, Timothy, 1656-1732.
Bradstreet, Simon, 1671-1741.
notes: Collaboration on authorship has been ascribed at various times to Timothy Woolbridge, Benjamin Colman, Simon Bradstreet and Ebenezer Pemberton.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Mather, Increase, 1639-1723. --  Order of the Gospel.
